forecast.forecast/data-source?city=Minsk&period=3: will get city information for current date from the data source based on period (max 3 days), returns object
forecast.forecast?city=Minsk: will return weather forecast from default data source for today, returns object

forecast-history.forecast-history?city=Minsk&startDate=20: get forecast history between the dates, returns list
forecast-history.forecast-history?city=Minsk&date=2021-01: post forecast for mentioned day for mentioned city
